title: Anything I can do about someone physically threatening a friend?
body: Hi, my friend was in a game and had an altercation happen with a teammate, and after the game was asked to do a 1v1 in a custom as they were obviously very tilted. He added me into the lobby and I was a little confused, but was kicked instantly. This person then proceeded to add me, and then asked about personal information about my friend, threatening us both. I obviously wasn't in the game before and was curious as to what action i could take against this person, if there even is something i could do?

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support with screenshots (if possible) and as much detail as possible. They can escalate it appropriately.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
